paper.title: Trapdoor one-way permutations and multivariate polynominals
paper.venue: International Conference on Information and Communication Security
paper.abstract: This article is divided into three parts. The first part describes the known candidates of trapdoor one-way permutations. The second part presents a new algorithm, called D*. As we will see, this algorithm is not secure. However, in the third part, D* will be a useful tool to present our new candidate trapdoor one-way permutation, called D**. This candidate is based on properties of multivariate polynomials on finite fields, and has similar characteristics to T. Matsumoto and H. Imaiu0027s schemes.
